title: NJ 11th Candidate Survey
completedHtml: Thank you for completing our NJ 11th Candidate Questionnaire. Results will be posted on NJ11th.com to help voters easily compare candidates.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Do you support President Trump deploying the US military into cities?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Do you support President Trump deploying the National Guard into cities?

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Should the US military play a role in Law Enforcement?

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Is it okay to withhold federal aid based on political alignment?

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Is it okay to use infrastructure funding as political leverage?

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Should the federal government police social issues and speech at universities?

elements.name: question7
elements.title: Should the politicians sue media organizations for bad coverage?

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Were the 2020 Presidential Election results legitimate?

elements.name: question9
elements.title: Did Trump's encouragement of "Stop the Steal" incite the January 6th riot?

choices.text: Yes, by lying & encouraging supporters to fight
No, but he should've stopped them sooner
No, they were rioting but not Trump's fault

elements.name: question10
elements.title: Were the 2025 NJ Governor Election results legitimate?

choices.text: Yes, the results show voters reject Jack & Trump

elements.name: question11
elements.title: Should the Government take stakes in major corporations?

choices.text: Yes, this is fine with me
Yes, at the discretion of the President
This is only acceptable for national security needs

elements.name: question12
elements.title: Should the Federal Reserve operate independently of political influence?

choices.text: No, it should follow executive direction

elements.name: question13
elements.title: Should the DOJ be used to pursue political opponents?

elements.name: question14
elements.title: Should the President rely heavily on executive orders?

choices.text: Yes, as long as they are Constitutional
No, they may be used but rare

elements.name: question15
elements.title: Should the President or FCC pressure media networks?

elements.name: question16
elements.title: Should the FTC be used to target political opponents or allies?

elements.name: question17
elements.title: Should wind energy factor in to the energy mix?

elements.name: question18
elements.title: Should solar energy factor in to the energy mix?

elements.name: question19
elements.title: Should fossil fuels factor in to the energy mix?

elements.name: question20
elements.title: Is AI and Data Center demand a major factor in increasing energy prices?

elements.name: question21
elements.title: Should the US pursue clean energy and emissions goals?

elements.name: question22
elements.title: Should the US rejoin and uphold the Paris Accord?

elements.name: question23
elements.title: Should our State and National Parks be protected and funded?

elements.name: question24
elements.title: Should federal lands be sold?

choices.text: Sell it to the highest bidder

elements.name: question25
elements.title: Should federal lands be protected from Drilling?

elements.name: question26
elements.title: Do you support the NESE pipeline project in NJ/NY?

elements.name: question27
elements.title: Should ICE agents operate with masks and without identification?

elements.name: question28
elements.title: Should humane conditions be enforced at immigrant detention facilities?

elements.name: question29
elements.title: Should immigrants be detained on military bases?

elements.name: question30
elements.title: Should local police assist ICE in immigration enforcement?

elements.name: question31
elements.title: Should non-citizens convicted of violent crimes be deported?

elements.name: question32
elements.title: Should non-citizens convicted non-violent crimes be deported?

elements.name: question33
elements.title: Should all non-citizens without documentation be deported?

elements.name: question34
elements.title: Does Due Process apply to citizens and non-citizens?

elements.name: question35
elements.title: Should ICE detain US citizens?

elements.name: question36
elements.title: Should ICE be allowed to profile and detain based on race, language, or job?

elements.name: question37
elements.title: Should public funding be used for private school vouchers?

elements.name: question38
elements.title: Does NJ have a quality public education system with great teachers?

elements.name: question39
elements.title: Should the US Department of Education be defunded?

elements.name: question40
elements.title: Should schools teach inclusive history?

elements.name: question41
elements.title: Do you support universal Pre-K?

elements.name: question42
elements.title: Should PBS receive public funding?

elements.name: question43
elements.title: Should NPR receive public funding?

elements.name: question44
elements.title: Should FEMA and NOAA be fully funded?

elements.name: question45
elements.title: Should NJ fund pensions for public servants?

elements.name: question46
elements.title: Should Social Security face budget cuts?

elements.name: question47
elements.title: Should Medicare face budget cuts?

elements.name: question48
elements.title: Should Medicaid face budget cuts?

elements.name: question49
elements.title: Should the Affordable Care Act subsidies be cut?

elements.name: question50
elements.title: Should we invest in vaccines and public health?

elements.name: question51
elements.title: Do you support a universal healthcare system in the US?

elements.name: question52
elements.title: Do you support an abortion ban?

choices.text: Yes, full ban with no exceptions

elements.name: question53
elements.title: Should states be allowed to enact laws to protect abortion access and medication?

elements.name: question54
elements.title: Should marriage equality remain protected under the law?

elements.name: question55
elements.title: Should transgender youth be allowed access to gender-affirming healthcare with parental and medical approval?

elements.name: question56
elements.title: Do you support federal protections that explicitly prohibit discrimination against transgender people in employment, housing, and healthcare?

elements.name: question57
elements.title: Should states be allowed to have a regulated medical marijuana industry?

elements.name: question58
elements.title: Should states be allowed to have a regulated recreational marijuana industry?

elements.name: question59
elements.title: Should freedom of speech be protected for all Americans?

choices.text: Only speech that aligns with my politics

elements.name: question60
elements.title: Should the right to peacefully protest be protected?

choices.text: Only for protesters who agree with my politics

elements.name: question61
elements.title: Do you support universal background checks for all gun purchases, including private sales and gun shows?

elements.name: question62
elements.title: Do you support a federal ban on assault-style weapons?

elements.name: question63
elements.title: Do you support states enacting red flag laws that let courts temporarily remove firearms from individuals deemed a danger to themselves or others?

elements.name: question64
elements.title: Should the Epstein investigation files be released to the public?

elements.name: question65
elements.title: Is it acceptable for candidates to campaign with White Nationalists?

elements.name: question66
elements.title: Is it acceptable for candidates to campaign with Election Deniers?

elements.name: question67
elements.title: Should the US host and defend a foreign dictator who ordered the killing of an American journalist?

elements.name: question68
elements.title: Should we increase taxes the wealthiest Americans?

elements.name: question69
elements.title: Are you willing to raise taxes on the middle class?

elements.name: question70
elements.title: Are you willing to raise taxes on Americans with the lowest income?

elements.name: question71
elements.title: Should tariff policies be aggressive and erratic?

elements.name: question72
elements.title: Should the Military budget be expanded?

elements.name: question73
elements.title: Should the US continue funding for Israel?

elements.name: question74
elements.title: Do you consider Benjamin Netanyahu a war criminal?

elements.name: question75
elements.title: Should Hamas be allowed to play a role in governing Gaza?

elements.name: question76
elements.title: Should the US recognize a Palestinian state?

elements.name: question77
elements.title: Do you support the military strikes in the Caribbean targeting Venezuela?

elements.name: question78
elements.title: Should the US continue to stand with Ukraine?

choices.text: Yes, with further sanctions on Russia

elements.name: question79
elements.title: Should the US remain in NATO and honor its mutual defense commitments?

elements.name: question80
elements.title: Has President Trump used military action without an immediate threat or notifying Congress in advance?

elements.name: question81
elements.title: Would you restrict arms sales to countries with documented human rights abuses?

elements.name: question82
elements.title: Do you support legislation to protect the right to unionize without retaliation?

elements.name: question83
elements.title: Do you support card check recognition as a valid method for forming a union?

elements.name: question84
elements.title: Will you sponsor laws that penalize employers who violate labor rights?

elements.name: question85
elements.title: Should federal representatives be allowed to trade stocks?

elements.name: question86
elements.title: Is it ethical for the President to launch a Meme Coin and make billions in Crypto?

elements.name: question87
elements.title: Do you support Presidential pardons for Jan 6 rioters, major donors, or convicted international drug traffickers?

elements.name: question88
elements.title: Will you accept funding for your campaign from Corporate PACs?

elements.name: question89
elements.title: Will you accept funding for your campaign from any PAC funded by Elon Musk?

elements.name: question90
elements.title: Will you accept funding for your campaign from any PAC funded by Jeff Bezos?

elements.name: question91
elements.title: Will you accept funding for your campaign from AIPAC?

elements.name: question92
elements.title: Will you accept funding for your campaign from any PAC?

elements.name: question93
elements.title: Will you accept lobbyist and special interest money for your campaign?

elements.name: question94
elements.title: Will you release your detailed financial information?

elements.name: question95
elements.title: Do you support the Mount Laurel Doctrine regarding town affordable housing requirements?

elements.name: question96
elements.title: Do you support state housing requirements overriding local zoning rules?

elements.name: question97
elements.title: Should new apartment buildings be required to include some affordable units?

elements.name: question98
elements.title: What do you call New Jerseys iconic breakfast meat?

elements.name: question99
elements.title: What is your vision for NJ and the US?

elements.name: question100
elements.title: What is your Candidate Code?
elements.description: This will help us ensure we match responses to the correct candidate
